Q-0-1.title: Internal Error
Q-0-1.message_template: An internal error occurred. This is a bug in Quarto.

Q-0-99.title: Generic Error
Q-0-99.message_template: Uncategorized Error. This should never appear in production, and is a bug in Quarto.

Q-1-1.title: YAML Syntax Error
Q-1-1.message_template: There is a syntax error in the YAML document being parsed.

Q-1-10.title: Missing Required Property
Q-1-10.message_template: A required property is missing from the YAML document.

Q-1-11.title: Type Mismatch
Q-1-11.message_template: The value has an incorrect type (expected one type, got another).

Q-1-12.title: Invalid Enum Value
Q-1-12.message_template: The value is not one of the allowed enumeration values.

Q-1-13.title: Array Length Constraint Violation
Q-1-13.message_template: The array length does not meet the minimum or maximum item constraints.

Q-1-14.title: String Pattern Mismatch
Q-1-14.message_template: The string value does not match the required pattern.

Q-1-15.title: Number Range Violation
Q-1-15.message_template: The numeric value is outside the allowed range or not a valid multiple.

Q-1-16.title: Object Property Count Violation
Q-1-16.message_template: The object has too many or too few properties.

Q-1-17.title: Unresolved Schema Reference
Q-1-17.message_template: A $ref reference in the schema could not be resolved.

Q-1-18.title: Unknown Property
Q-1-18.message_template: An unknown property was found in a closed object schema.

Q-1-19.title: Array Uniqueness Violation
Q-1-19.message_template: Array items must be unique but duplicates were found.

Q-1-20.title: Failed to parse metadata value as markdown
Q-1-20.message_template: Invalid markdown will be interpreted as a string. Consider adding a '!str' tag to the entry.

Q-2-1.title: Unclosed Span
Q-2-1.message_template: I reached the end of the block before finding a closing ']' for the span or link.

Q-2-2.title: Mismatched Delimiter in Attribute Specifier
Q-2-2.message_template: I expected a '}', language specifier, an identifier, a class specifier, or a key-value pair.

Q-2-3.title: Key-value Pair Before Class Specifier in Attribute
Q-2-3.message_template: This class specifier appears after the key-value pair.

Q-2-4.title: Missing Space After Div Fence
Q-2-4.message_template: A space is required after ':::' when specifying div attributes.

Q-2-5.title: Unclosed Emphasis
Q-2-5.message_template: I reached the end of the block before finding a closing '_' for the emphasis.

Q-2-7.title: Unclosed Single Quote
Q-2-7.message_template: I reached the end of the block before finding a closing "'" for the quote.

Q-2-8.title: Unsupported Code Block Syntax
Q-2-8.message_template: Quarto Markdown requires executable code block options in YAML.

Q-2-9.title: HTML Element Auto-converted
Q-2-9.message_template: HTML elements are automatically converted to raw HTML inlines.

Q-2-10.title: Closing Quote Without Matching Open Quote
Q-2-10.message_template: A space is causing a quote mark to be interpreted as a quotation close.

Q-2-11.title: Unclosed Double Quote
Q-2-11.message_template: I reached the end of the block before finding a closing '"' for the quote.

Q-2-12.title: Unclosed Star Emphasis
Q-2-12.message_template: I reached the end of the block before finding a closing '*' for the emphasis.

Q-2-13.title: Unclosed Strong Star Emphasis
Q-2-13.message_template: I reached the end of the block before finding a closing '**' for the strong emphasis.

Q-2-14.title: Unclosed Underscore Emphasis
Q-2-14.message_template: I reached the end of the block before finding a closing '_' for the emphasis.

Q-2-15.title: Unclosed Strong Underscore Emphasis
Q-2-15.message_template: I reached the end of the block before finding a closing '__' for the strong emphasis.

Q-2-16.title: Unclosed Superscript
Q-2-16.message_template: I reached the end of the block before finding a closing '^' for the superscript.

Q-2-17.title: Unclosed Subscript
Q-2-17.message_template: I reached the end of the block before finding a closing '~' for the subscript.

Q-2-18.title: Unclosed Strikeout
Q-2-18.message_template: I reached the end of the block before finding a closing '~~' for the strikeout.

Q-2-19.title: Unclosed Editorial Insert
Q-2-19.message_template: I reached the end of the block before finding a closing ']' for the editorial insert.

Q-2-20.title: Unclosed Editorial Delete
Q-2-20.message_template: I reached the end of the block before finding a closing ']' for the editorial delete.

Q-2-21.title: Unclosed Editorial Comment
Q-2-21.message_template: I reached the end of the block before finding a closing ']' for the editorial comment.

Q-2-22.title: Unclosed Editorial Highlight
Q-2-22.message_template: I reached the end of the block before finding a closing ']' for the editorial highlight.

Q-2-23.title: Unclosed Inline Math
Q-2-23.message_template: I reached the end of the block before finding a closing '$' for the inline math.

Q-2-24.title: Unclosed Code Span
Q-2-24.message_template: I reached the end of the block before finding a closing '`' for the code span.

Q-2-25.title: Unclosed Image
Q-2-25.message_template: I reached the end of the block before finding a closing '](url)' for the image.

Q-2-26.title: Unclosed Inline Footnote
Q-2-26.message_template: I reached the end of the block before finding a closing ']' for the inline footnote.

Q-2-27.title: Line Break Before Shortcode Close
Q-2-27.message_template: Line breaks are not allowed immediately before the shortcode closing delimiter `>}}`.

Q-2-28.title: Line Break Before Escaped Shortcode Close
Q-2-28.message_template: Line breaks are not allowed immediately before the escaped shortcode closing delimiter `>}}}`.

Q-2-29.title: Indented Footnote Content Not Supported
Q-2-29.message_template: Quarto markdown does not support indented footnote content. Use the div syntax instead: `::: ^ref ... :::`

Q-2-30.title: Multi-Paragraph Footnote Indentation Not Supported
Q-2-30.message_template: Indented paragraph following footnote definition suggests Pandoc multi-paragraph footnote syntax, which is not supported in quarto-markdown. Use the div syntax instead: `::: ^ref ... :::`

Q-2-31.title: Inline Code Execution Not Allowed in URLs
Q-2-31.message_template: Inline code execution syntax (`{language} ...) cannot be used inside image or link destinations.

Q-2-32.title: Triple Star Emphasis Not Allowed
Q-2-32.message_template: Quarto Markdown doesn't support `***`. Consider using `*__` instead.

Q-2-33.title: Spaces in Link Targets
Q-2-33.message_template: Link targets cannot contain spaces. Replace spaces with %20.

Q-2-34.title: Unquoted Shortcode Parameter Starting with Digit
Q-2-34.message_template: Shortcode parameter values starting with digits must be quoted.

Q-3-1.title: IO Error During Write
Q-3-1.message_template: An I/O error occurred while writing output.

Q-3-10.title: Inline Note Definition Not Supported
Q-3-10.message_template: Inline note definitions ([^id]: content) cannot be rendered in this output format because they require content coalescing, which is not yet implemented.

Q-3-11.title: Fenced Note Definition Not Supported
Q-3-11.message_template: Fenced note definitions cannot be rendered in this output format because they require content coalescing, which is not yet implemented.

Q-3-12.title: Unresolved Note Reference
Q-3-12.message_template: A note reference was not converted to a Span during postprocessing. This is a bug in the postprocessor.

Q-3-20.title: Block Metadata Not Supported
Q-3-20.message_template: YAML metadata blocks are internal AST nodes that cannot be rendered in this output format.

Q-3-21.title: Caption Block Not Supported
Q-3-21.message_template: Standalone caption blocks cannot be rendered in this output format. Captions should be attached to figures or tables.

Q-3-30.title: Shortcode Not Supported
Q-3-30.message_template: Quarto shortcodes are not representable in this output format.

Q-3-31.title: Unprocessed Note Reference
Q-3-31.message_template: Note reference was not converted to Span during postprocessing. This may indicate a bug or a filter that bypassed postprocessing.

Q-3-32.title: Standalone Attribute Not Supported
Q-3-32.message_template: Standalone attributes (e.g., in table cells or headings) are not representable in this output format.

Q-3-33.title: Unprocessed Insert Markup
Q-3-33.message_template: Insert editorial markup ([++...]) was not desugared to Span during postprocessing.

Q-3-34.title: Unprocessed Delete Markup
Q-3-34.message_template: Delete editorial markup ([--...]) was not desugared to Span during postprocessing.

Q-3-35.title: Unprocessed Highlight Markup
Q-3-35.message_template: Highlight editorial markup ([!!...]) was not desugared to Span during postprocessing.

Q-3-36.title: Unprocessed EditComment Markup
Q-3-36.message_template: EditComment editorial markup ([>>...]) was not desugared to Span during postprocessing.

Q-3-40.title: Invalid Metadata Structure
Q-3-40.message_template: Document metadata must be a map structure for this output format.

Q-3-50.title: LineBlock Not Supported in ANSI Format
Q-3-50.message_template: LineBlock elements cannot be rendered in ANSI terminal output.

Q-3-51.title: CodeBlock Not Supported in ANSI Format
Q-3-51.message_template: CodeBlock elements cannot be rendered in ANSI terminal output.

Q-3-52.title: Table Not Supported in ANSI Format
Q-3-52.message_template: Table elements cannot be rendered in ANSI terminal output.

Q-3-53.title: Figure Not Supported in ANSI Format
Q-3-53.message_template: Figure elements cannot be rendered in ANSI terminal output.

Q-3-54.title: NoteDefinitionPara Not Supported in ANSI Format
Q-3-54.message_template: Note definitions cannot be rendered in ANSI terminal output.

Q-3-55.title: NoteDefinitionFencedBlock Not Supported in ANSI Format
Q-3-55.message_template: Fenced note definitions cannot be rendered in ANSI terminal output.

Q-9-1.title: XML Syntax Error
Q-9-1.message_template: There is a syntax error in the XML document being parsed.

Q-9-2.title: Unexpected End of XML Input
Q-9-2.message_template: The XML document ended unexpectedly before parsing was complete.

Q-9-3.title: Mismatched XML End Tag
Q-9-3.message_template: An XML end tag does not match its corresponding start tag.

Q-9-4.title: Invalid XML Structure
Q-9-4.message_template: The XML document has an invalid structure.

Q-9-5.title: Empty XML Document
Q-9-5.message_template: The XML document contains no root element.

Q-9-6.title: Multiple XML Root Elements
Q-9-6.message_template: The XML document contains multiple root elements, which is not valid XML.

Q-10-1.title: Template Parse Error
Q-10-1.message_template: Failed to parse the template syntax.

Q-10-2.title: Undefined Variable
Q-10-2.message_template: The variable referenced in the template is not defined in the context.

Q-10-3.title: Partial Not Found
Q-10-3.message_template: The referenced partial template file could not be found.

Q-10-4.title: Recursive Partial
Q-10-4.message_template: Partial templates are nested too deeply, possibly indicating infinite recursion.

Q-10-5.title: Unresolved Partial Reference
Q-10-5.message_template: A partial reference was not resolved during template compilation.

Q-10-6.title: Unknown Pipe
Q-10-6.message_template: The pipe transformation specified in the template is not recognized.

Q-10-7.title: Invalid Pipe Arguments
Q-10-7.message_template: The arguments provided to the pipe transformation are invalid.
